name: etch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cut a pattern, picture, etc. into a smooth surface, especially on metal or glass, using acid or a sharp instrument: He etched his name on a piece of glass.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to cut a pattern, picture, etc., in a surface: Rory ordered a baseball bat with his own name etched in the wood. fig.The building had become etched in clear detail in her mind.
